parameters: What is the meaning of this?
What is the meaning of this?
I'm very sorry for what happened earlier.
I hope I did not injured you with my arrows.
It's okay, you are very strong.
This land will be safe with you guarding it.
I hope you are not hurt.
You are from that human land, \c[1]LongHorn\c[0] if I remember.
Yes, multiple times and there is one human keep staring
at me from a distance everyday.
Anyway, why did you come here?
Well, we are trying to resolve the issue
between you and the Danepu Tribe.
Is there anyway we can help to stop killing
them? They barely can defend themselves and
You speak of an unknown request.
What is Danepu Tribe, you are saying.
They are the humans south of here across
You are killing them and they have no idea
You referring to the native humans.
My son came few moments ago and told me their cheiftain
However, we centaurs defending ourselves only.
We never attack anyone that did not attack us at first.
He was performing his duty to defend our land.
We have taken care of it, as some of the centaurs went
rouge and they wanted to attack whomever they wanted.
We strike down some of our brothers and sisters for
attempting to crumple our relations with humans and
Sir, we got the rest of the rouges cornered accompanied
You are free to do as you please here.
Just don't get yourself into troubles, humans.
I hope you came here in peace.
I'm going to be a warrior when I grow up.
My father told me that we can live up to 500 years.
When we reach the age of 80.
We can start using weapons and explore areas.
You look adult, are you on your 300s years?
I will turn 18 after couples of months.
I wasn't allowed to leave the haven until I reached my
You are the one who saved me from those native humans.
I couldn't wait 2 more years to start my exploration
alone and I got caught up with those native humans.
My father is the \c[4]Centaur Champion\c[0] of our nation.
He is 430 years old and he is very experienced in
fights more than anyone you will ever see.
I'm sorry, but my job is to protect our haven from
anyone to enters except other centaurs.
Native humans and humans are out there.
I wonder what else are out there too.
Who are you, and what have you done to our brothers
No no, there's nothing I did to your
Let's say, I have showed them the right
\c[2]Phantom\c[0] of the \c[2]Elite Four,\c[0] why am I not
Everywhere you go to, you ruin everything
Your desire will almost reach the surface.
Stay away from him as far as you can.
You have sided the wrong group.
Yeah, good to see you as well, old man.
You will go down this time for good.
I think this is the end of your plans.
Surrender or you will be finished!
However, there is plenty for you to learn
I think we need a rest before we continue.
Our brothers and sisters have fallen to his will.
He is an enemy and I don't think he is a
human. Don't mistake us with him please, he
Your actions proved everything to us.
Please accept this reward as a gift from the centaurs.
You have obtained a \i[7482]Good Will Necklace
We will be siding with anyone we see wearing this
necklace. Consider us as an ally whenever you need us.
We will take care of our injured brothers and sisters.
You may feel free to walk around our lands.
Thank you for saving my son in the native humans
village. He couldn't resist waiting for exploration and
he got into troubles in his first day.
No more rouge centaurs attacking the Danepu Tribe.
Everyone is safe and peace is upon us.
Thank you for helping our brothers and sister.
We will never forget your faces during our lives.
Isn't it beautiful here in centaurs lands?
